text.div:
Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than Equal To 140

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    Code Display
    3077F Most recent systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)

name: Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than Equal To 140
